# whiskybase data

<https://www.whiskybase.com/>

![](images/clipboard-1739132209.png)

Founded in the Netherlands in 2007, we’re the world’s premier provider of whisky data, shopping, and whisky-related services. We reach whisky enthusiasts and whisky professionals in nearly every country at all stages of their whisky journey.

Millions of people use Whiskybase.com to look up their whisky bottles, organize a collection, plan a whisky event, or document their whisky experiences by adding ratings, reviews, and more to our whisky database, the world’s largest.

# rvest package

rvest helps you scrape (or harvest) data from web pages. It is designed to work with magrittr to make it easy to express common web scraping tasks, inspired by libraries like beautiful soup and RoboBrowser.

If you’re scraping multiple pages, I highly recommend using rvest in concert with polite. The polite package ensures that you’re respecting the robots.txt and not hammering the site with too many requests.

![](images/clipboard-1520421631.png){width="500"}


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
packageVersion("rvest")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
[1] '1.0.4'
```


:::
:::
